src:
Timor Leste Akui Ketangguhan Timnas Indonesia U-19
07 Nov 2019, 01:29 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Timor Leste harus mengakui keunggulan Timnas Indonesia U-19 saat kedua tim bentrok pada partai perdana Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 Grup K. Dalam laga yang berlangsung di Stadion Madya, Senayan, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019) malam WIB, tim asuhan Lee Minyoung itu takluk dengan skor 1-3.
Sejak pertandingan baru memasuki menit ke-2, Timor Leste sudah tertinggal lebih dulu usai Timnas Indonesia U-19 mencetak gol via M. Fajar Fathur Rahman. Timor Leste kemudian sempat membalas melalui Mouzinho de Lima melalui titik putih (51').
Namun, Timnas Indonesia U-19 kembali unggul pada menit ke-61 lewat gol yang dicetak David Maulana. Tim tuan rumah lalu memastikan kemenangan 3-1 setelah Fajar kembali mencetak gol di menit ke-77.
"Tim yang kami punya bermain kurang bagus. Sementara tim Indonesia bermain dengan bagus dan mampu menguasi pertandingan dan hasilnya semua Anda lihat 3-1," ujar Lee Minyoung usai laga.

text:
East Timor Admits U-19 Indonesian National Team's Resilience
Nov 7 2019, 01:29 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Timor Leste must recognize the superiority of the Indonesian U-19 national team when the two teams clashed in the inaugural party of the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Group K. In a match that took place at Madya Stadium, Senayan, Jakarta, Wednesday (6/11/2019 ) night WIB, Lee Minyoung's care team was defeated with a score of 1-3.
Since the game has just entered the 2nd minute, Timor Leste has left behind after the Indonesian National Team U-19 scored via M. Fajar Fathur Rahman. Timor Leste then had a chance to reply via Mouzinho de Lima through the white point (51 ').
However, the Indonesian national team U-19 back ahead in the 61st minute through goals scored by David Maulana. The home side then sealed the win 3-1 after Dawn scored again in the 77th minute.
"The team that we have played is not good enough. While the Indonesian team played well and was able to take charge of the match and the results are all you see 3-1," said Lee Minyoung after the match.
